main event: Multiple witnesses observed an unidentified object with reddish-orange lights that hovered, pulsated, and maneuvered erratically in North Andover, Massachusetts on February 9, 1967.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude of approximately 1,000 feet and was about 2 miles from the observers.
The object was observed for about 5 minutes, during which it pulsated and maneuvered in an erratic manner, not like any known aircraft.
The object appeared to accelerate rapidly and then hover motionless.
Several observers corroborated the initial observer's description of the object.
The sighting was reported to the Tactical Air Command (TAC) and the National Investigations Committee on Aerial Phenomena (NICAP).
sighted object: Reddish-orange lights that hovered, pulsated, and maneuvered erratically
